abstract: Police in Ormoc City, Philippines, file murder charges against Joge Bung Zarco, owner of ferry that capsized, killing at least 59 people, and against other crew members.
lead_paragraph: The police in a central Philippine city filed murder complaints against the owner and the crew of a ferry that capsized, leaving more than 50 people dead.

headline.main: Murder Complaints Filed Against Ferry Crew in Philippines
headline.print_headline: Murder Complaints Filed Against Ferry Crew

snippet: The police in a central Philippine city filed murder complaints against the owner and the crew of a ferry that capsized, leaving more than 50 people dead.
